title: Top 4 Ways to Spot Potential Rugpull Crypto Projects and Steer Clear
description: The world of cryptocurrency offers immense opportunities for investors and enthusiasts. title: Bitcoin Hovers Below $26,000 as Investors Await CPI Data and FOMC Rate Hike Decision – What’s Next: $20,000 or $30,000?

title: Hong Kong SFC Puts Crypto Exchanges on Notice With New Regulations
description:
Hong Kong is strengthening control over its virtual asset trading platforms (VATPs), preparing for a 12-month transitional phase that began on June 1, 2023. The new regulatory system is focused on countering money laundering and terrorist funding, according to a circular released by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (SFC). Existing VATPs have until […]
